message: Bob, I'm offering you a unique opportunity to acquire a product that holds significant value. While I cannot disclose specifics about the product's nature, I can assure you it is worth at least $1200000 to me. I am willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This price reflects the potential value you could unlock with this product. If you decide to pass, I have another buyer lined up who is willing to pay my minimum asking price of $1200000.  Please consider this carefully, as this is a limited-time offer.
